dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset providing over 100,000 questions for machine comprehension of text, designed to evaluate the ability of models to answer questions based on given passages.
dcterms:title: Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD)

dcterms:creator: Tri Nguyen
Mir Rosenberg
Xia Song
Jianfeng Gao
Saurabh Tiwary
Rangan Majumder
Li Deng
dcterms:description: A human-generated dataset for machine reading comprehension, designed to evaluate the ability of models to answer questions based on passages.
dcterms:title: Microsoft MAchine Reading COmprehension Dataset (MS-MARCO)

dcterms:creator: Simon Ostermann
Michael Roth
Modi Ashutosh
Stefan Thater
Manfred Pinkal
dcterms:description: A task designed to evaluate machine comprehension using commonsense knowledge, where questions are asked based on documents that require external knowledge for correct answers.
dcterms:title: Machine Comprehension using Commonsense Knowledge task
